name: Crypt Escape
description:
Do you have what it takes to defeat the curse and escape the crypt?   Theme: Cursed

Be careful.... every wrong move intensifies the curse.

Small demo I put together for the 2020 Kenney Game Jam. 

Controls:
Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys
Interact: Space Bar
Restart: R
Zoom: Mouse Wheel - Game to easy? For an extra challenge zoom in until the screen is reversed :)

Thanks,
Lucifin
